title: Scotland
author: Scotland
created_time: November 30, 2022, 02:08:01 PMLast edit: September 18, 2023, 10:18:41 AM by Scotland
content: Hello BTC Talk !  I buy cheap game and ps plus subscriptions for your playstation accounts.How is it working ?It's very simple, completely legal (not stolen card), I log in to your account with my Turkish card and buy the product you want with Turkish local currency, I just need to log in to your account.No country restrictions  You can contact us for references and price information.We only accept Paypal &  crypto payment & crypto voucher method.BTCContact Me :ScotlandsX (Telegram)https://wa.me/447717393638 (Click go WhatsApp)

comments.author: Woodie
comments.body: I would be interested in some games but when you say "cheap games" will you be game sharing from already made psn accounts that you own or maybe all games required need to be purchased on the user's account?Quote from: Scotland on November 30, 2022, 02:08:01 PMIt's very simple, completely legal (not stolen card), I log in to your account with my Turkish card and buy the product you want with Turkish local currency, I just need to log in to your account.Does psn account have to be Turkish or maybe all origins are accepted? Is there any chance of console  being banned for doing this?

comments.author: Scotland
comments.body: Quote from: Woodie on December 28, 2022, 12:07:30 PMI would be interested in some games but when you say "cheap games" will you be game sharing from already made psn accounts that you own or maybe all games required need to be purchased on the user's account?Quote from: Scotland on November 30, 2022, 02:08:01 PMIt's very simple, completely legal (not stolen card), I log in to your account with my Turkish card and buy the product you want with Turkish local currency, I just need to log in to your account.Does psn account have to be Turkish or maybe all origins are accepted? Is there any chance of console  being banned for doing this?We do not share games.We log in to the account and buy the game or product using Turkey and countries with cheap local units.The region where your account is registered does not matter.When this is done, there has been no ban risk in the accounts so far, but you can contact Playstation support for this.Daily Bump *
